name: coco's snowflake ornament
notes:
this pattern is named after my pomchi, coco, who loved christmas and inspired this design.
to find more information about this pattern: [https://thek4project.com/blogs/free-patterns-tutorials/coco-s-crochet-snowflake-a-quick-15-minute-ornament-pattern][1]

✨ materials:
medium worsted weight yarn (#4)
crochet hook size 6/7 or smaller
scissors and tapestry needle

 skill level: beginner
⏱️ time: about 15 minutes

 want to support the k4 project? you can purchase the pdf pattern:  https://thek4project.com/products/cocos-snowflake-crochet-ornament
when you purchase a pattern, a portion of proceeds helps support animal welfare ❤️
